item.title: Disabling Auto-popup Special Characters in macOS
item.description: In macOS, by default, holding down the Option key and pressing any letter key will automatically trigger a special character popup. This feature isn’t particularly useful for most of us and can actually interfere with the use of certain keyboard shortcuts. Let’s look at how to disable this functionality.
